# Communicacion done right

```{r}
# Load necessary library
library(ggplot2)


# Set seed for reproducibility
set.seed(123)

# Simulate data
time <- seq(0, 100, by = 1)  # Time from diagnosis to death (e.g., in months)
health <- exp(-0.05 * time) + rnorm(length(time), mean = 0, sd = 0.05)  # Exponential decay with some noise

# Create a data frame
data <- data.frame(time = time, health = health)

# Plot the data
ggplot(data, aes(x = time, y = health)) +
  geom_line(color = "blue") +
  geom_point(color = "red", size = 0.5) +
  labs(title = "Health Over Time from Diagnosis to Death",
       x = "Time (months)",
       y = "Health") +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5))



````
